objects.text:
• Premium Cotton Comfort
• Motivational Design
• Easy Care Machine Washable

product_details.name: Inspirational 'Believe in Yourself' Premium Cotton T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Stylish navy blue color perfect for casual and motivational wear
• Modern typography design with layered 'BELIEVE' text effect
• High-quality cotton material for maximum comfort
• Versatile round neck design suitable for all occasions
• Empowering message that boosts confidence and self-belief
• Durable print technology ensures long-lasting design
• Easy to care for and machine washable
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Ideal for both casual wear and workout sessions
• Perfect gift for motivation seekers and self-improvement enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner features a bold promotional layout with a clear left-right division. On the left side, text layers form the main message hierarchy. The heading (`heading`) is large, uppercase, and in white, emphasizing a buy-one-get-one-free deal. Below it, a vibrant coral tagline (`tagline`) energizes the offer. The subheading (`subheading`) highlights the product name and material. Features of the product are listed using bullet points in the `description` layer. The `price` stands out in a large coral shade, while the `cta` text sits within a matching coral button (`cta_button_bg`). The `caption` closes the message in fine print. On the right side, the `product_image` showcases a navy t-shirt with inspirational typography. Wavy coral lines accentuate the middle section, and subtle white blob graphics enhance depth.

**Color Palette**:
- Navy Blue: `#1a3a5f`
- Midnight Blue: `#0c1f33`
- Coral Red: `#ff6b6b`
- Soft Coral: `#ff9e9e`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Light Gray: `#f8f8f8`
product_color: The product image features a navy blue t-shirt with a motivational text design in varying shades of blue and white. The primary color is a deep navy blue (#0F1C38), used as the shirt's main background. The bold, block text "BELIEVE" appears in a muted steel blue (#4C5A70), providing structure, while remaining secondary to the central message. Overlaid on this is the scripted "In yourself" in a soft, pastel white (#E8E9EB), subtly infused with a very light blue undertone. The colors are blended harmoniously, with contrast used effectively to highlight the motivating text, ensuring clarity and visual appeal. Ideal for banners: #0F1C38, #4C5A70, #E8E9EB.
